scripts.prebuild: echo 'Commit:' && git rev-parse HEAD && echo 'Branch:' && git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD && echo '--- src/App.jsx (first 140 lines) ---' && sed -n '1,140p' src/App.jsx && echo '--- grep for gas-station-before-and-after ---' && (grep -Rni --include='*.{js,jsx,ts,tsx,css,json,md}' 'gas-station-before-and-after' . || true)
